name: Tzunami SharePoint migration
tag_list: sharepoint, sharepoint-migration, moss-2007, sharepoint-2007, moss-migration, livelink-migration, eroom-migration, documentum-migration, lotus-notes-migration, docushare-migration, aqualogic-migration, confluence-migration
overview:
Tzunami Inc. is a leading provider of SharePoint Migration solutions. Pioneers in the field of content migration, Tzunami enables advanced migration from multiple sources. Developed over years of experience, the Tzunami Deployer Family of Products is designed to respond to all SharePoint 2007 and SharePoint 2010 migration requirements.

Tzunami Deployer, its flagship migration tool, saves up to 90% of traditional migration time - lowering labor costs and providing a quick access to more accurate content. Offering a user-friendly solution to real-world business challenges, Tzunami Deployer effortlessly transfers data from older Enterprise Content Management Systems (ECM). Saving time and dramatically reducing total-cost-of-ownership, Tzunami automates the entire process of migrating unstructured content. Facilitating the preparation of remote modeling and migration, Tzunami enables the seamless planning offline and even off-site, working on virtual simulations of both systems.

Tzunami has research and development facilities and implementation teams based in North America and Europe, and offers round-the-clock comprehensive support. With a strong track-record of serving leading global enterprises, Tzunami boasts the expertise and flexibility to deliver simple, fast and effective solutions for all client migration requirements.
